Key Match Events: Podziemski recorded a nearly triple-double with 13 points, 8 rebounds, and 7 assists.
Trayce Jackson-Davis added 15 points and 9 rebounds.
Draymond Green contributed 14 points, 6 assists, 4 rebounds, and 5 blocks.
Buddy Hield led the scorers with 21 points, hitting 4 of 12 from beyond the 3-point arc.
Jordan Hawkins put up a game-high 23 points for New Orleans.
Golden State took a 13-point lead into the fourth quarter and extended it to a 91-71 cushion with seven minutes remaining.
Golden State outscored New Orleans 39-33 on 3-pointers.
Post-Match Reflections: Draymond Green celebrated with Trayce Jackson-Davis after the game.
